name: Greek Dressing
description: Classic Mediterranean flavours of mint, oregano and garlic, ready in minutes! This versatile dressing brings out the best in just about every dish—it can be drizzled over just about anything your heart desires. Salads, fresh and roasted veggies, grilled pitas, you name it! The best part? Unlike those store-bought versions that can pack in over 100 mg of sodium, this homemade version has almost none.
preparation: In a Cruet, combine dressing mix, oil, and red wine vinegar; shake well. Store in the fridge for up to 1 week.
tips: To make a creamy Greek Feta version, add 2 tbsp crumbled feta cheese to prepared dressing.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.
